Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has a high energy conversion efficiency and emits a low level of pollutants in the environment.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: One of the crucial elements is an anode that, typically, is a composite of nickel and yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ).
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: The microstructure morphology of an anode plays an important role in determining the electrochemical performances of a single cell and, consequently, a stack of cells.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: Therefore, the microstructure optimization design should be included in the development of a system at a very early stage.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: The anode material microstructure can be tailored to ful-fill the role it has at the particular location in the stack.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: This paper presents a novel approach of using an evolutionary algorithm to optimize the microstructure of an SOFC's anode.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: The optimization problem consists of 16 microstructural parameters connected by the mesh of the dependencies.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: One group of algorithms that can face this challenge is an evolutionary algorithm family.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: In this paper, a genetic algorithm and a particle swarm optimization are employed to optimize the cell microstructure and to help in improving the performance of an SOFC.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: The developed mathematical model can correctly predict the performance of the SOFC anode and is employed in the evolutionary algorithms to select the optimal microstructure.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms

Sentencas: The results show that the optimal microstructure leads to better cell performance than the conventional one.
Titulo: A Novel Approach to the Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Using Evolutionary Algorithms
